de.charite.compbio.jannovar.cmd.annotate_vcf

Class AnnotatedVCFWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.charite.compbio.jannovar.cmd.annotate_vcf.AnnotatedVariantWriter
      • de.charite.compbio.jannovar.cmd.annotate_vcf.AnnotatedVCFWriter

  • public class AnnotatedVCFWriter
extends AnnotatedVariantWriter
    Annotate variant in VariantContext and write out through HTSJDK (i.e. in VCF/BCF format).

    • Method Detail

      • getOutFileName

        public String getOutFileName()
        Create and return output file name. The output file name is the same as the input, with the extension ".EXT" replaced by ".jv.EXT" where EXT is one of "vcf.gz", "vcf", and "bcf". If the extension is different from these values, ".jv.vcf.gz" is appended to the input file name. When options.outVCFFolder is set then the file is written to this folder.
        Specified by:
        getOutFileName in class AnnotatedVariantWriter
        Returns:
        output file name, depending on this.options
